title: Play Again Custom Games Bug
body:
Who else gets this and when are they planning to fix it? Or is it intentional. It's been happening to me for a couple of months now and when I duo queue I want to play again not make a custom game.

Rant

replies.body: I think that happens when u disconnected from the game and reconnect back in. Thats the only time i have this problem.
It's very rare that I will disconnect from a game but I will get the custom page screen. So I don't think that would be the issue.
Well i have noticed thats the only time i get this problem

thats old as, rito wont listen to me tho

if you have 2 or 3 people in q with you, and you click play again you get the customs page
